productDescription: The Rainbow ring is the newest addition to our Atelier Collection and now available in sterling silver. This handmade statement ring will spice up every outfit. Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled silver.

optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled silver. Also available in gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
